forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 3C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 39F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low near 0C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening with more clouds for overnight. Low 34F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain in the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 1C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 36F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High near 45F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low around 40F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 6C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 44F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Low 2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Low 37F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 5C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 43F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 1C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early transitioning to snow showers late. Low around 35F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mixture of rain and snow showers. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers in the evening will give way to a mixture of rain and snow late at night. Low 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
